verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came אַֽחֲרֵיכֵ֡ן <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Chen It came to pass after this בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u came בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- also [that] the children מוֹאָב֩ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av of Moab וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the children עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon וְעִמָּהֶ֧ם׀ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-ma-Hem together מֵֽהָעַמּוֹנִ֛ים <S%H5984><s%> me-ha-'am-mo-Nim and with them [other] beside the Ammonites עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat against Jehoshaphat לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah. to battle

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u, Then there came וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Gi-du some that told לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָט֙ <S%H3092><s%> li-ho-sha-Fat Jehoshaphat לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba There cometh עָלֶ֜יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha against הָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon multitude רָ֛ב <S%H7227><s%> rav a great מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver against thee from beyond לַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> lai-Yam the sea מֵאֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> me-'a-Ram; on this side Syria וְהִנָּם֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Nam and behold בְּחַֽצְצ֣וֹן be-chatz-Tzon תָּמָ֔ר <S%H2688><s%> ta-Mar, and behold they [be] in Hazazontamar הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he עֵ֥ין 'ein גֶּֽדִי׃ <S%H5872><s%> Ge-di. which [is] Engedi

וַיִּרָ֕א <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-Ra feared וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and set יְהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat And Jehoshaphat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav himself לִדְר֣וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> lid-Roosh to seek לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-ra- and proclaimed צ֖וֹם <S%H6685><s%> Tzom a fast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- throughout כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. all Judah

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-ka-ve-Tzu gathered themselves together יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, And Judah לְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh to ask מֵֽיְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; [help] of the LORD גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> gam even מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei even out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u they came לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mod stood יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat, And Jehoshaphat בִּקְהַ֧ל <S%H6951><s%> bik-Hal in the congregation יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> vi-ru-sha-Lim and Jerusalem בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הֶחָצֵ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer court הַחֲדָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H2319><s%> ha-cha-da-Shah. the new

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar, And said יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-nu of our fathers הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אַתָּֽה־ <S%H859><s%> 'at-tah- you ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him [art] not thou God בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim, air וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you מוֹשֵׁ֔ל <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel, reign בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> mam-le-Chot [not] thou over all the kingdoms הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim; Gentile וּבְיָדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-ya-de-Cha your hand כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach [is there not] power וּגְבוּרָ֔ה <S%H1369><s%> u-ge-vu-Rah, and might וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein no עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha against לְהִתְיַצֵּֽב׃ <S%H3320><s%> le-hit-yatz-Tzev. so that none is able to withstand

הֲלֹ֣א׀ <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah O אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, [Art] not thou our God הוֹרַ֙שְׁתָּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> ho-Rash-ta [who] didst drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יֹשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei before עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel וַֽתִּתְּנָ֗הּ <S%H5414><s%> vat-tit-te-Nah, and gavest לְזֶ֛רַע <S%H2233><s%> le-Ze-ra' it to the seed אַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham אֹֽהַבְךָ֖ <S%H157><s%> 'o-hav-Cha thy friend לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. alway

וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ־ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu- And they dwelt בָ֑הּ Vah; וַיִּבְנ֨וּ <S%H1129><s%> vai-yiv-Nu therein and have built לְךָ֧׀ le-Cha בָּ֛הּ bah מִקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> mik-Dash thee a sanctuary לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> le-shim-Cha therein for thy name לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Should תָּב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo cometh עָלֵ֜ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu and רָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah, If [when] evil חֶרֶב֮ <S%H2719><s%> che-Rev upon us [as] the sword שְׁפוֹט֮ <S%H8196><s%> she-fOt judgment וְדֶ֣בֶר <S%H1698><s%> ve-De-ver or pestilence וְרָעָב֒ <S%H7458><s%> ve-ra-'Av or famine נַֽעַמְדָ֞ה <S%H5975><s%> na-'am-Dah we stand לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit this house הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this וּלְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> u-le-fa-Nei-cha, and in thy presence כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki שִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha (for thy name בַּבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit house הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this וְנִזְעַ֥ק <S%H2199><s%> ve-niz-'Ak assemble אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you מִצָּרָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H6869><s%> mitz-tza-ra-Te-nu unto thee in our affliction וְתִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> ve-tish-Ma' then thou wilt hear וְתוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> ve-to-Shi-a'. and help

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And now behold the children עַמּ֨וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon וּמוֹאָ֜ב <S%H4124><s%> u-mo-'Av and Moab וְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> ve-har- and mount שֵׂעִ֗יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir, Seir אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not נָתַ֤תָּה <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-tah whom thou wouldest not let לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El Israel לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> la-Vo invade בָהֶ֔ם va-Hem, בְּבֹאָ֖ם <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'Am when they came out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki סָ֥רוּ <S%H5493><s%> Sa-ru but they turned מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-lei-Hem and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not הִשְׁמִידֽוּם׃ <S%H8045><s%> hish-mi-Dum. from them and destroyed

וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-Hin-neh- see הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem, like גֹּמְלִ֖ים <S%H1580><s%> go-me-Lim Behold [I say how] they reward עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; by לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> la-Vo us to come לְגָ֣רְשֵׁ֔נוּ <S%H1644><s%> le-Ga-re-She-nu, to cast us out מִיְּרֻשָּׁתְךָ֖ <S%H3425><s%> mi-ye-rush-sha-te-Cha of thy possession אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֽוֹרַשְׁתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> Ho-rash-Ta-nu. which thou hast given us to inherit

אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu O our God הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo nor תִשְׁפָּט־ <S%H8199><s%> tish-pot- wilt thou not judge בָּ֔ם Bam, כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein else בָּ֙נוּ֙ ba-nu כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach, them;for we have no might לִ֠פְנֵי <S%H6440><s%> Lif-nei against הֶהָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> he-ha-Mon company הָרָ֛ב <S%H7227><s%> ha-Rav this great הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this הַבָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> hab-Ba that cometh עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; against וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu, we לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor נֵדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> ne-Da' against us neither know מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what נַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh, what to do כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha against עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-nu. but our eyes

וְכָ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol- All יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, And all Judah עֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> 'o-me-Dim stood לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- with טַפָּ֖ם <S%H2945><s%> tap-Pam their little ones נְשֵׁיהֶ֥ם <S%H802><s%> ne-shei-Hem their wives וּבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei-Hem. and their children פ Peh

וְיַחֲזִיאֵ֡ל <S%H3166><s%> ve-ya-cha-zi-'El Then upon Jahaziel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זְכַרְיָ֡הוּ <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Ya-hu of Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בְּ֠נָיָה <S%H1141><s%> Be-na-yah of Benaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְעִיאֵ֧ל <S%H3273><s%> ye-'i-'El of Jeiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מַתַּנְיָ֛ה <S%H4983><s%> mat-tan-Yah of Mattaniah הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> hal-le-Vi a Levite מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons אָסָ֑ף <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf; of Asaph הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah came עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach came the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal. of the congregation

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said הַקְשִׁ֤יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> hak-Shi-vu Hearken כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah ye all Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei and ye inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ve-ham-Me-lech and thou king יְהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat; Jehoshaphat כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לָכֶ֗ם la-Chem, אַ֠תֶּם <S%H859><s%> 'At-tem you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-re-'U unto you Be not afraid וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תֵּחַ֙תּוּ֙ <S%H2865><s%> te-Chat-tu nor dismayed מִפְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei by reason הֶהָמ֤וֹן <S%H1995><s%> he-ha-Mon multitude הָרָב֙ <S%H7227><s%> ha-Rav of this great הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, of this כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah for the battle כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki but לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him. [is] not yours but God's
